text: Kukwakwe nikwakuujila kwenu wanaose, (achi ni) chilanga cha Allah chakuonaonape. Chisimu Jwalakwe nijwaakutandisyaga gumba iwumbe, kaneka chachiyiusyausya (kuigumba panyuma pakuwa) kuti akaalipile mwa chilungamiko awala waakulupilile nikutendaga yambone, sano awala waakanile akwete kupata yakumwa ya mesi gamasemule nnope ni ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope ligongo lya ukafili wao uwaliji nkutenda
